edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.simple_rpg

Class Reward

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.simple_rpg.Reward

  • public class Reward
extends java.lang.Object
    To represent a "reward" that can be received by the MainCharacter from things like a quest, treasure chest, or defeating enemies.
    Author:
    Alvin Tan
